allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add real performance metrics to Dashboard portfolio stats

Changed from placeholder values to real calculations:
- Win rate: Average across all backtest results
- Max drawdown: Worst drawdown from all backtests
- Capital: Final equity from best-performing strategy
- Open positions: Currently 0 (no live trading)

Technical changes:
- Added winRateLabel, maxDrawdownLabel, openPositionsLabel in DashboardView.h
- Modified LoadPortfolioStats() to query backtest results from database
- Calculate aggregate metrics from all historical backtests
- Display calculated values instead of hardcoded 0.0
EOF
)")
